titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to F. W. Smith
CWG13656

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 11; Bundles of AG & QMG Expenditures 1864-65; Bundle 1

body.p:
NO. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To F W. Smith, Dr.

row.cell: To Services rendered as Hospital Steward of the State Military Hosp Stationed at Frankfort Ky. for the Month ending April 30th 1864

body.p: I certify that the above account is correct and just, and that the services were rendered as stated, and that they were necessary for the public service.

Wm H Gardner Surgeon in Charge Hospital
Quarter-Master.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 28th of April, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter=Master General of the State of Kentucky, Thirty dollars and -- cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)

312
No. 22.
No 79 Abstract G
F W Smith
Dollars 30.00/100
Paid April 28th, 1864.
Hospital
Services
Hospital Steward
Iss 340
(Certif. No. 184)
